basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around, the plant turns to yellow after flowering
basic.color: Flower color purple, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, slightly resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
